item.title: Jimhomme.com - About
item.description: This site was born because I had music production notes scattered everywhere and no central location for them, and I keep forgetting how to do production tasks, and kept referring back to other sites and YouTube videos. I wanted to cut down on ctimes when I’m out of creation mode. Problem solved.
